name: UrlShortener
description: Url Shortener made in Node JS with MongoDB Database.

DB_URL.description: Your Mongodb Connection Url. Get it from https://www.mongodb.com/cloud/atlas/register

SITE_URL.description: Enter herokuappname.herokuapp.com or your custom domain.

SITE_KEY.description: Your Site Key. Get it from https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin/create

SECRET_KEY.description: Your Secret Key. Get it from https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin/create
